硰字的基本解释

硰
shā
〔硰石〕古地名，在今中国山西省宁武县境。

硰字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shā］
［《廣韻》所加切，平麻，生。］
［《廣韻》千可切，上哿，清。］
［《廣韻》作可切，上果，精。］
见“硰石”。

硰字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　硰； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页831第09
【廣韻】所加切【集韻】【韻會】師加切，?音沙。硰石，地名。在樓煩西。【史記·灌嬰傳】從擊韓信，破於硰石。　又【集韻】千可切，音瑳。又千臥切，音剉。義?同。

硰字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
硰字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
硰
shā
〔硰石〕An ancient place name, in the border of Ningwu County, Shanxi Province, China.
硰
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shā]
[The cut added in "Guangyun", plain hemp, raw. ]
["Guangyun" Qian Keqi, Shangkui, Qing. ]
["Guangyun" can be cut, fruited, refined. ]
See "硰石".
硰
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [Stone Character Department] 　硰; Kangxi strokes: 12; Page number: Page 831 09
[Guang Yun] added cuts [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Teachers add cuts,? Yinsha. Zongshi, place name. Annoying West in the building. [Historical Records·Guan Ying Biography] Cong hit Han Xin and broke through Yan Shi.　[Jiyun] Thousands of cuts, sound 瑳. Thousands of lying and cutting, sound cut. Righteous? Same.
